mcq.statement: Which historical precedent did President Trump hope to emulate by attempting to purchase Greenland?

options.b: President Andrew Johnson's purchase of Alaska
options.c: President James Monroe's acquisition of Florida

mcq.one_liner: President Trump aimed to emulate **President Andrew Johnson's purchase of Alaska from Russia in 1867** by trying to buy Greenland.
